post_content_localized.en:
Head to the NYC Winter Wine Festival this March because we all know that it isn’t good to keep things bottled up!

There is a good Riesling to head to Times Square – the NYC Winter Wine Festival! Whether you're a self-proclaimed connoisseur or you just like a good glass of wine, this event takes the cake (or the grape?) and makes for a great NYC weekend getaway.

On March 10 visitors of the Times Square Wine Festival presented by New York Wine Events can sample hundreds of world class wines. Tastings include reds, whites, traditional blends, and unique combinations. Regions that will be proudly represented are Italy, California, Australia, New Zealand, France, Austria, Argentina, Portugal, and more. Great wine deserves great food to go along with it, so there will also be many hors d’oeuvres and other treats on hand.

The Playstation Theater at Times Square will feel more like the hills of Tuscany as it is converted to an indoor vineyard for the day. Relax over a glass of your new favorite vintage all without leaving the city.

Why limit your happy to an hour? When headed into town for the NYC Winter Wine Festival, The Manhattan Club is the perfect place to stay within walking distance of Times Square.
